channel.title: Giveaway - Still in the works
channel.description:
So before I actually get to what will be given away, I want to assure you that [b]the giveaway has not started and there is [u]NO[/u] way to enter as of this time[/b]. I'm currently working on getting approval from Moparstaff in order to allow this to happen.
I went to a tech school for 2 years, and in that time I got a bunch of free shit. Some of that includes: A server (Dell poweredge something), A computer, computer parts, loads of knowledge, an account on dreamspark, and some windows 7 & 8 (Legal and valid) keys. I believe I'm on dreamspark until sometime in 2014, and I've used some of the downloads and shit..
What I'm willing to give away from what I've got:
A bunch of shit off dreamspark (This includes some beta software such as Visual Studio 2013). Windows 7 keys and Windows 8 keys.
There is no way I'd send my server or computer parts.. That'd be costly and shit. Lol.
How To Enter: -Not decided
How To Win: -Not decided
What you win: The winner(s) will get to pick from a list of items (what I said above, I'll go into detail on shit on dreamspark).
AGAIN - This giveaway is [b]not[/b] open yet. I need permission with moparstaff in order to go further. I also need help setting up how to enter/how to win.
So if you have a good [u]real[/u] idea on how this should work, feel free to post it. Bumps are welcomed too. Also, if you're part of the staff please help in making me not look like an idiot and get me permission to do this :P

item.title: Giveaway - Still in the works
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:18, topic:526786”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=645534.msg4342523#msg4342523 date=1375342100]

The solution is not to use Windows 7.

I don’t see how that is a solution, because it will only lead to more problems. I don’t have a problem with any other operating system, and I’d be willing to learn any new ones, but that doesn’t mean Windows 7 shouldn’t be used just because a newer version is out.

Windows bad, Linux good.
[/quote]
Off topic… Hey mr web dev, fix the missing yahoo icon for the forums :P[/quote]It’s there, it just doesn’t always load.

Read full topic

it does it so much. its fucking annoying. Imagine if i still played runescape and i was pking and all the sudden it moves to the tiles cuz trackpad reacts to windows 8. I despise windows 8 so much. I brought my self windows 7 and installed it over the preinstalled windows 8

item.title: Giveaway - Still in the works
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I would like to have the Windows 7 key whenever this does go into effect.

Also, to help out with drawing names and stuff if this giveaway does actually happen, I believe you should just gather a list of people interested in winning something, and require that they do post what they would like, and why. You could then have an application select a random name from the list of people interested in a certain item, and whoever’s name is selected will be the winner of that item.

Read full topic
